name: Shurikens - An online multiplayer game
description:
-Shurikens-  ported from scratch

[Connect with turbowarp server]

Instructions: 

Click "edit" to change the ninja's color 

"Z" key to start 

WASD or arrow keys to move 

Click or press space to throw shurikens 

Your health is shown at the top of the screen 

Enjoy!

 Credits:

@griffpatch for the multiplayer engine 

@thechaotic for some sounds 

Music: humnoid
